## Atom class

Mutable wrapper for an (usually) immutable value. Support for watches.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Atom<T> implements IAtom<T>, IEquiv 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(val, valid)](./atom.atom._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>Atom</code> class |
